column4: so, noone of you had an issue where switching between consoles, like f1 and going back to f7 there is a black screen instead of X?
no graphics card, and restarting the server does not help, and   it does start as normal and works as long as I dont change to console...
LOL -- you have to have a graphics card for the display to function
and by no graphics card, i mean its an onboard thing.
join #flood and past the result of # lspci for me
you got the part where: it works when I boot, until I switch to console?
ok, so I should try getting help when I am at that computer?
in the last release of ubuntu this was a problem -- I'm getting some information to work with so maybe I can help you fix it
